languages.text: {n}Джай качает головой и хмурится, но предательская улыбка надежды проскальзывает на ее лицо.{/n} "Прекрати. Не время дурачиться... О, проклятье, не смотри на меня такими глазами. Я теряю волю от твоего взгляда, хотя знаю, что горько об этом пожалею".

{n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай качает головой и хмурится, но предательская улыбка надежды проскальзывает на ее лицо.{/n} "Прекрати. Не время дурачиться... О, проклятье, не смотри на меня такими глазами. Я теряю волю от твоего взгляда, хотя знаю, что горько об этом пожалею".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊摇了摇头，皱起了眉，但脸上却不受控制地露出了一丝充满希望的笑容。{/n}“够了，现在可不是开玩笑的时候……别这样看着我。真要命，我感觉你的目光正在让我越来越动摇。哪怕我明明知道，这样的决定最终会带来痛苦，让我后悔不已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊摇了摇头，皱起了眉，但脸上却不受控制地露出了一丝充满希望的笑容。{/n}“够了，现在可不是开玩笑的时候……别这样看着我。真要命，我感觉你的目光正在让我越来越动摇。哪怕我明明知道，这样的决定最终会带来痛苦，让我后悔不已。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは首を振り、顔をしかめたが、その顔にはそれを裏切るような、希望の笑みが浮かんでいた。{/n}「やめて。今はふざけている場合じゃないの…そんな目で見ないでよ。ああ、もう、その目があたしの決意を弱めているのを感じる。苦い後悔をするとわかっていても」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは首を振り、顔をしかめたが、その顔にはそれを裏切るような、希望の笑みが浮かんでいた。{/n}「やめて。今はふざけている場合じゃないの…そんな目で見ないでよ。ああ、もう、その目があたしの決意を弱めているのを感じる。苦い後悔をするとわかっていても」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae menea la cabeza con el ceño fruncido, pero no puede contener una maliciosa sonrisa de esperanza.{/n} «Para ya. No es momento para juegos... ¡No me pongas esa cara! Maldita sea, no me puedo resistir a esa mirada, y eso que sé que luego me voy a arrepentir».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae menea la cabeza con el ceño fruncido, pero no puede contener una maliciosa sonrisa de esperanza.{/n} «Para ya. No es momento para juegos... ¡No me pongas esa cara! Maldita sea, no me puedo resistir a esa mirada, y eso que sé que luego me voy a arrepentir».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae secoue la tête, les sourcils froncés, mais elle ne peut réprimer un sourire qui trahit son espoir.{/n} « Arrêtez. L'heure n'est pas à la plaisanterie... Ne me regardez pas comme ça. Bon sang, je sens ma détermination faiblir sous vos yeux, alors que je sais très bien que je vais le regretter. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae secoue la tête, les sourcils froncés, mais elle ne peut réprimer un sourire qui trahit son espoir.{/n} « Arrêtez. L'heure n'est pas à la plaisanterie... Ne me regardez pas comme ça. Bon sang, je sens ma détermination faiblir sous vos yeux, alors que je sais très bien que je vais le regretter. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae schüttelt stirnrunzelnd den Kopf, aber in ihr Gesicht schleicht sich ein verräterisches Lächeln der Hoffnung.{/n} "Hört auf. Jetzt ist der falsche Zeitpunkt für Spielereien ... Schaut mich nicht so an. Verdammt, Eure Augen machen mich so richtig weich, aber ich weiß, dass ich das später bitter bereuen werde."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae schüttelt stirnrunzelnd den Kopf, aber in ihr Gesicht schleicht sich ein verräterisches Lächeln der Hoffnung.{/n} "Hört auf. Jetzt ist der falsche Zeitpunkt für Spielereien ... Schaut mich nicht so an. Verdammt, Eure Augen machen mich so richtig weich, aber ich weiß, dass ich das später bitter bereuen werde."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae başını sallıyor, kaşlarını çatıyor ama bu hareketlere ihanet eden, umut dolu gülümsemesi de yüzüne yayılmayı başarıyor.{/n} "Kes şunu. Oyun oynayacak zaman değil. Bana öyle bakma. Of, acı bir şekilde pişman olacağımı bilsem de bu bakışların kararlılığımı zayıflattığını hissedebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae shakes her head, frowning, but a traitorous smile of hope steals across her face.{/n} "Stop. Now's not the time to play around... Don't look at me like that. Damn it all, I can feel those eyes weakening my resolve, even when I know I'll come to bitterly regret it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae başını sallıyor, kaşlarını çatıyor ama bu hareketlere ihanet eden, umut dolu bir gülümseme yüzüne yayılmayı başarıyor.{/n} "Kes şunu. Oyun oynayacak zaman değil. Bana öyle bakma. Lanet olsun, acı bir şekilde pişman olacağımı bilsem de bu bakışların kararlılığımı zayıflattığını hissedebiliyorum."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
